pages.title: Nether Enriching Catalyst
pages.text: Resource needed:$(li)[Advanced Crafting table]$(li2)$(l:waters/water)x1 Aqua Catalyst$()$(li2)x2 Cobalt Ingots$(li2)x2 Ancient Debris$(li2)x4 Quartz$(li2)x4 Netherrack$(li2)x4 Glowstone Dust$(li2)x8 Lava Buckets$(br2)This Catalyst can be used to generate Nether Enriching Water by Throwing it in Strong Enriching Water

pages.name: Nether Enriching Water
pages.text: To obtain different items you can drop :$(li)Blank Nuggets$(li)Blank Pebbles$(li)Blank Dust$(li)Blank Gem$(br)
